condition: [OR]([AND]([NEQ](<*VALUE(Interface with TPS Required?)*>,No),[NEQ](<*VALUE(MIB Configuration Required?)*>,Yes)),[NEQ](<*VALUE(Server Redundancy Requirement?)*>,Redundant))
name: Show_Server_Red_message
description: If Server Redundancy Requirement? is selected as Redundant, when MIB Configuration Required? is selected as Yes & Interface with TPS Required? as selected as No, then display message in top of the section as 'For MIB, recommended Server option is Non Redundant'.
